text:
@Talkmaster I'm more worried about bigots such as yourself.
Opinions like these bring shame to the attorney community.
You think we'll look back at COVID-19 fondly? 
Okay, tell that to the masses who've lost loved ones because of this pandemic. Go ahead tell them.
